quotes.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Why don’t scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard
